problem:
Q: Which of the following statements is true about the graph of the equation $2 y-3 x=-4$ in the $x y$-plane? Answer Choices: (A)It has a negative slope and a positive $y$-intercept. (B)It has a negative slope and a negative $y$-intercept. (C)It has a positive slope and a positive $y$-intercept. (D)It has a positive slope and a negative $y$-intercept.
A: Among A through D, the answer is
